statements: UPDATE crop_yield_data SET yield_per_acre = 25.3, average_rainfall = 30.5 WHERE year = 2021 AND crop_type = 'Wheat';
UPDATE crop_yield_data SET soil_ph_level = 6.2, yield_per_acre = 30.8 WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND year = 2020;
UPDATE crop_yield_data SET yield_per_acre = 25.5, average_rainfall = 60.8 WHERE year = 2020 AND crop_type = 'Corn';
UPDATE crop_yield_data SET average_rainfall = 55.2, soil_ph_level = 6.5 WHERE crop_type = 'Wheat' AND year = 2019;
UPDATE crop_yield_data SET yield_value = 25.5 WHERE year = 2020 AND crop_name = 'Corn';
UPDATE crop_rotation SET suggested_crop = 'Rice' , rotation_cycle = 3 WHERE crop_name = 'Wheat';
UPDATE crop_yield_data SET yield_value = 45.6 WHERE year = 2020 AND crop_name = 'corn';
UPDATE crop_rotation SET suggested_crop = 'wheat' , previous_crop = 'corn' WHERE crop_name = 'barley' AND rotation_cycle = 2;
UPDATE crops SET yield = yield + 10 WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE fields SET yield_amount = 500 WHERE field_id = 2;
UPDATE crops SET crop_name = 'Rice', yield = 500 WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE fields SET yield_year = 2022, yield_amount = 600 WHERE field_id = 3;
UPDATE crop_yield_data SET yield_amount = 125.5 WHERE year = 2020 AND crop_name = 'Corn'
UPDATE crop_rotation SET crop_one = 'Wheat', crop_two = 'Barley', crop_three = 'Soybean' WHERE rotation_id = 1
UPDATE crop_yield_data SET yield_amount = 1500.25 WHERE year = 2020 AND crop_name = 'Corn';
UPDATE crop_species SET optimal_climate = 'Hot and Dry' WHERE species_id = 3;
UPDATE crop_yield_data SET yield_kg_per_hectare = 300 WHERE crop_id = 1 AND year = 2021;
UPDATE crop_rotation SET rotation_season = 'Summer' WHERE rotation_id = 5;
UPDATE crop_yield_data SET yield_kg_per_hectare = 350.75 WHERE crop_id = 1 AND year = 2020;
UPDATE crop_rotation SET previous_crop_id = 2, next_crop_id = 3, rotation_season = 'Summer' WHERE rotation_id = 5;
